word_mean: 胶原：一种蛋白质，组成皮肤、肌腱、骨、软骨及其他所有结缔组织的白纤维(胶原纤维)的成分，由原胶原分子构成，煮沸后则成为明胶。另见disease项下

sentence.Network_en: The collagen that is included in face creams comes from animal skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 面霜中的胶原蛋白取自动物皮层。

sentence.Network_en: Thesolution of collagen-PVA was wet spined with the sodium sulfate as coagulant and collagen-PVA composite fibers were prepared.
sentence.Network_cn: 在此基础上，以硫酸钠为凝固剂，对胶原-PVA共混溶液进行湿法纺丝，制备了胶原-PVA复合纤维。

sentence.Network_en: Collagen fibers appear in the wound.
sentence.Network_cn: 在伤口中出现了胶原纤维.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...希望加快受损皮肤愈合、淡化疤痕者。, 【胶原蛋白(collagen)】, 胶原蛋白是皮肤的主要成分，皮肤中胶原蛋白占72%，真皮中80%是胶原蛋白，胶原蛋白在皮肤中构成了一张.
...极细末，疗汤火伤皮绽肉烂者并效，干则麻油调敷，湿则干掺，其痛立止，其解火毒，疗骨蒸、杀瘵虫之功，可默悟矣。3现代研究编辑化学成分含骨胶原（collagen）、碳酸钙、磷酸钙、碘等．鳖甲浸出物含量以水浸出物为最多．背甲与腹甲均含钙、磷、钠、镁、钾、锌、铁、锰、钴、铜、砷等11种元素．化学成分研究进展.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French collagène, from Greek kolla 'glue' + French -gène (see -gen)

entry.tran: (常用于化妆品或美容手术中，使皮肤显得年轻的)胶原蛋白
entry.def: Collagen is a protein that is found in the bodies of people and animals. It is often used as an ingredient in cosmetics or is injected into the face in cosmetic surgery, in order to make the skin look younger.

example.ex: The collagen that is included in face creams comes from animal skin.
example.tran: 面霜中的胶原蛋白取自动物皮层。

means.word_mean: 1. a fibrous scleroprotein in bone and cartilage and tendon and other connective tissue; yields gelatin on boiling
